basicAttack.name: Destined Promise
basicAttack.basicAttack: Baizhi instructs You'tan to perform up to 4 consecutive attacks, dealing Glacio DMG.
basicAttack.heavyAttack: Baizhi continuously consumes Stamina to command You'tan to attack enemies, dealing Glacio DMG. During Heavy Attack, Baizhi can command You'tan to move.
basicAttack.midairAttack: Baizhi consumes Stamina and summons Youâ€™tan in mid-air to perform a Plunging Attack, dealing Glacio DMG.
basicAttack.dodgeCounter: Use Basic Attack after a successful Dodge to attack the target, dealing Glacio DMG.

skills.description: Baizhi calls You'tan to attack the target, dealing Glacio DMG while restoring HP for the entire team.
Baizhi summons You'tan to restore HP for the entire team, generating 4 stacks of Remnant Entities.

skills.name: Remnant Entities
skills.description: Remnant Entities follow the active team members and automatically consume 1 stacks of Remnant Entities to attack the targets every 2.5s, dealing Glacio DMG on hit while restoring HP to all team members nearby.

skills.name: You'tan
skills.description: A Remnant Creature that answers to Baizhi's mind and desires while sharing all her attributes. You'tan goes back to Baizhi when Baizhi dodges.

skills.name: Concentration
skills.description: Baizhi consumes all "Concentrations" when casting Heavy Attack or Resonance Skill Emergency Plan to continuously restore HP for Characters nearby. Each 1 "Concentration" consumed restores HP for 1 time every 2s. When Baizhi consumes "Concentration" to cast Heavy Attack, Baizhi additionally restores Concerto Energy and Resonance Energy; When Baizhi consumes "Concentration" to cast Resonance Skill Emergency Plan, Baizhi additionally restores Concerto Energy.

skills.name: Concentration
skills.description: Baizhi can hold up to 4 "Concentrations". Baizhi obtains 1 "Concentration" for every Basic Attack on hit.

skills.name: Harmonic Range
skills.description: When Baizhi casts Resonance Skill Emergency Plan, You'tan generates a field of Euphonia that lasts for 15s. Euphonia: ATK of the Resonators who picks up Euphonia is increased by 15% for 20s.

skills.name: Stimulus Feedback
skills.description: For every Heavy Attack on hit, Baizhi restores HP to the nearby team member with the least HP equal to 0.25% of Baizhi's max HP.

skills.name: Overflowing Frost
skills.description: Baizhi calls You'tan to perform 1 plunging attack, dealing Glacio DMG while restoring HP to all team members nearby.

skills.name: Rejuvinating Flow
skills.description: Heal the incoming Resonator by 1.54% of Baizhi's max HP every 3s for 30s. The healed Resonator has their DMG Amplified by 15% for 6s.
